title: The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield flaunts her trim pins at a skincare event
text:
She's rumoured to be in a relationship with Bachelorette reject Todd King, with the pair being spotted kissing on multiple occasions.

But on Saturday, The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield enjoyed a day out solo in Sydney's Bondi, where she attended Tribe Skincare's second birthday party at The Bucket List.

The bubbly blonde put on a leggy display in a leopard print minidress, joining the likes of Bachelor co-star Emma Roche and MKR's Sonya Mefaddi at the event.

Taking a walk on the wild side! The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield (pictured) flaunted her trim pins in a leopard print minidress at a skincare event in Sydney on Saturday... after being spotted kissing Todd King

Abbie's dress featured a plunging neckline and was sleeveless, with a layered skirt.

The blonde - who failed to win Matt Agnew's heart on The Bachelor - teamed the look with strappy block heels.

She wore her shot locks out and over her shoulders, neatly straightened and wore makeup including a deep pink lip.

All in the details! The blonde - who failed to win Matt Agnew's heart on The Bachelor - teamed the look with strappy block heels. She wore her shot locks out and over her shoulders, neatly straightened and wore makeup including a deep pink lip

She appeared in high spirits on the day as she joined the likes of former Bachelor co-star, Emma Roche.

The brunette showed off her trim figure in a red and pink floral mini-dress.

Also at the event was former My Kitchen Rules star and fashion designer, Sonya Mefaddi.

Fancy seeing you here! She appeared in high spirits on the day as she joined the likes of former Bachelor co-star, Emma Roche (pictured)

Sonya stunned on the day in a red crop top and matching high-waisted trousers.

Abbie's appearance at the event comes amid rumours she's dating Todd King from The Bachelorette.

Last month, the stunner was seen enjoying a steamy kiss with Todd at Brisbane Airport, as she dropped him off, after spending a romantic night in together.

They've also been spotted kissing at the beach.

Red hot! Also at the event was former My Kitchen Rules star and fashion designer, Sonya Mefaddi (pictured). Sonya stunned on the day in a red crop top and matching high-waisted trousers

She however denied the dating rumours before the beach trip, telling the Outspoken podcast at the time: 'We aren't dating.'

'We had two dates. We just pashed [kissed] on a couple of dates,' she insisted when quizzed on her relationship with Todd.

'I'm just a normal chick on a beach with a friend on a date getting to know someone.'
description: She's rumoured to be in a relationship with Bachelorette reject Todd King, with the pair being spotted kissing on multiple occasions.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
